repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Outdoor Advertising Association of Connecticut records
did.abstract: Outdoor advertising professional organization in Connecticut in the 1970s-1990s. Collection contains the organizational records of the Outdoor Advertising Association of Connecticut, primarily consisting of correspondence (1970-1987), rosters, bylaws, and other organizational files. Also included are files related to the Scenic Roadways project with the State of Connecticut, as well as lobbyist files and information on senate bills that may affect outdoor advertising. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising, and Marketing History.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Outdoor Advertising Association of Connecticut Records, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Outdoor Advertising Association of Connecticut Records were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2007.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Materials may not have been ordered and described beyond their original condition.
